name: nativescript-wikitudearchitectview
description: A NativeScript plugin wikitude architect view.

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns livesync android --watch
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-wikitudearchitectview && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.setup: cd demo && npm install && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..

author: jin
